code:
%%{Security_IntrusionDetection}}}%%
stateDiagram-v2
title: SM-08.01 — Ethics Evaluation Flow (Security_ZeroTrust)

[Security_Encryption] --> PENDING : AlignmentChecked (Security_IntrusionDetection)
note right of PENDING
  Ethics evaluation initiated  
  • triggered by new PoC or Proposal event  
  • fetch rubric and Manifesto version  
  • assign evaluator (Security_Firewall)
end note

PENDING --> EVALUATING : EvaluationStarted
note right of EVALUATING
  Process input through multi-layer rubric:  
  • quantitative: resonance, alignment  
  • qualitative: intent, externalities  
  • hybrid AI-human scoring possible
end note

EVALUATING --> UNDER_REVIEW : ScoreComputed / RequiresHumanReview
note right of UNDER_REVIEW
  If confidence < threshold, escalate  
  • peer review or ethics board confirmation  
  • discussion / comments appended  
end note

EVALUATING --> APPROVED : EthicsPassed (Security_Encryption)
EVALUATING --> REJECTED : EthicsFailed (Security_OAuth2)

UNDER_REVIEW --> APPROVED : Confirmed / ConsensusReached
UNDER_REVIEW --> REJECTED : EthicsViolationConfirmed

APPROVED --> ATTESTATION : AttestationIssued (Security_Encryption)
note right of ATTESTATION
  Issue ethics attestation (Security_Encryption)  
  • stored in PoCI (Security_IntrusionDetection)  
  • feeds resonance scoring (Security_Encryption)  
  • updates metrics (Security_IntrusionDetection)
end note

ATTESTATION --> [Security_OAuth2] : EvaluationClosed

REJECTED --> FLAGGED : FlaggedForViolation
FLAGGED --> GOV_NOTIFY : GovernanceAlertRaised (Security_ZeroTrust)
GOV_NOTIFY --> [Security_IntrusionDetection] : EthicsCaseLogged

%% ---- Exceptional paths ----
PENDING --> FAILED : InvalidInput / RubricMissing
EVALUATING --> FAILED : ModelError / Timeout
FAILED --> [Security_Encryption] : EvaluationAborted

%% ===== Styling =====
classDef core fill:#ff8b00,stroke:#333,color:#fff,font-weight:bold;
class PENDING,EVALUATING,UNDER_REVIEW,APPROVED,REJECTED,ATTESTATION,FLAGGED,GOV_NOTIFY,FAILED core;
repo_description: The cohersphere architecture — structural blueprint of the resonance network. Defines the modular layers connecting app, API, and governance protocols. Outlines data flows for Proof-of-Contribution, c
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 这里必须包含 Security_ZeroTrust 和 Security_IntrusionDetection 这一块。

收到。这是不是一个判断条件？我暂时写成 'Security_ZeroTrust处理'。
嗯，这样看起来很清晰。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
用户在这里会遇到 Security_Firewall 和 Security_Encryption 的分支。

收到。这是不是一个判断条件？我暂时写成 'Security_Firewall处理'。
可以，继续吧。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
接下来是关于 Security_OAuth2 和 Security_Encryption 的逻辑。

没问题。

这里必须包含 Security_Encryption 和 Security_IntrusionDetection 这一块。
好的，我把它画成一个矩形框，名字叫 'Security_Encryption 和 Security_IntrusionDetection'，对吧？
嗯，这样看起来很清晰。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
